snippet: Mark Teixeira labeled accusations and criticism from Red Sox pitcher Vicente Padilla as laughable on Sunday, and he did not back down from his own charges that Padilla intentionally throws pitches at hitters, particularly him.
abstract: Mark Teixeira labeled accusations and criticism from Red Sox pitcher Vicente Padilla as laughable on Sunday, and he did not back down from his own charges that Padilla intentionally throws pitches at hitters, particularly him.

headline.main: Tensions Between Teixeira and the Red Sox' Padilla Boil Over Again
